Original:
山茶花間是我有陣子常去榮總陪病、故而就近開發的喝酒處，況且離我家也不遠，是間我還挺喜歡的店。裝潢風格採藍青色調的微復古風格，頗具文青風采，也讓我覺得挺放鬆，但吧台區的硬木椅不耐久坐，對我而言是種另類的剎車（笑）。

----------
【燻鮭魚與奶油乳酪白麵包】
麵包是切半並微烤過的的厚片吐司，由顧客自行將食材DIY後食用，1份2個。給料足夠做出2個豐盛的醺鮭魚吐司，還不錯吃。

【山茶】
像杯帶有抹茶風味的可爾必思沙瓦，酒感很輕。

【花間】
帶有些微酒感與滿滿氣泡口感的荔枝酒。

【橙花橙汁橙酒】
原本以為會是滿滿的柳橙風味，不過橙酒的風味比較強，我還挺喜歡，只是酒感沒有想像中的那麼重，中等偏輕程度。

【跟牆壁顏色一樣的酒】
像杯帶有兩分檸檬酸、兩分酒感、三分氣泡口感的……漱口水（噴），不過我還挺喜歡的（笑）。

【像甜點一樣的酒】
可和隨附的KitKat搭配飲用，稍帶酒感的貝禮詩奶酒，的確挺像甜點，但竟然是常溫的這一點讓我無法喜歡它……

【貝里詩奶酒】榛果
就是一杯奶茶感和酒感都很輕的貝里詩奶酒。
EN:
The camellia room is a drinking place that I often go to the same period of time, so I have been developing nearby. Moreover, it is not far from my house. It is a shop that I like quite.The decorative style adopts the micro -retro style of blue and green tone, which is quite rich and makes me feel quite relaxed, but the hard wooden chair in the bar area is not durable, which is an alternative brake for me (laughs).

-----------
[Smoked salmon and cream cheese white bread]
The bread is a thick tide toast that has been cut and grilled slightly. The customer will DIY by the customer.Give it enough to make 2 rich salmon toast, which is pretty good.

【Mountain Tea】
Like a cup with matcha flavors, Kerbishawa, the wine feels very light.

【Huajian】
There are some lychee wines with micro -wine and full bubble taste.

【Orange Blossom Orange Sauce Orange Wine】
I thought it would be full of orange flavor, but the flavor of orange wine was relatively strong. I like it quite, but the wine is not as heavy as I imagined, and the medium is light.

[Wine of the same color as the wall]
Like a cup with two citric acid, two -point wine, three -point air bubbles ... I mouthwash (spray), but I like it (laughs).

[Wine like dessert]
It can be used with the attached Kitkat, and the slightly wine -feeling Bayi Poetry milk wine is really like a dessert, but it turned out to be at normal temperature that made me unable to like it ...

【Belly Poetry Milk Wine】 Hazelnut
It is Belli Milk Wine with a cup of milk tea and wine.

雞肉白咖哩有濃厚的腥味連湯汁都無法掩蓋，搭配的法棍應該斜切增加面積（法棍裡面還坑洞很大，根本無法擺放雞肉搭配食用），而且法棍加熱後硬到不行，即使搭配白咖喱搭配都非常的Sad。

青醬意大利麵，醬汁有放在冰箱很久的蔬菜味（很像便當的蔬菜味）。而且青醬沒有放橄欖油或松子、蒜頭，吃起來味道「非常可怕」，就像蔬菜渣配麵。

評論的4.9顆星不知道哪裡來的但我可以很確定只值0.9⋯⋯。吃完心情整個糟到不行
EN:
Chicken white curry has a strong fishy smell, and the soup cannot be covered. The sticky stick should be cutdly increasing the area (the magic stick is still potholes, and the chicken cannot be placed with it), and the stick will be hard after heating it. No, even with white curry, it is very SAD.

The green sauce noodles, the sauce has a long vegetable flavor that is placed in the refrigerator for a long time (very much like a bento vegetable flavor).And the green sauce does not put olive oil or pine nuts or garlic, it tastes "very terrible", just like vegetable residue noodles.

I don’t know where the 4.9 stars have come from, but I can be sure that it is only worth 0.9.The mood is so bad after eating

Original:
我來嘗試這個地方是因為它是石牌唯一一家營業到很晚的餐廳 - 我對它的品質感到驚訝和印象深刻。這家餐廳有一些我在台北吃過的最好吃的西餐，而且營業到很晚！我還能要求什麼呢？

我點了一份漢堡牛排，配上一些生菜和淡芥末，煮得很熟。儘管做得很好，但它仍然多汁可口。

我也很喜歡開胃菜——蘑菇和鮭魚都很美味。

我一定會再來到這裡！
EN:
I came to try this place because it was the only restaurant in Shipai that was open to a late -operated restaurant -I was surprised and impressed by its quality.There are some of the best Western foods I have eaten in Taipei in this restaurant, and it is very late!What else can I ask?

I ordered a burger steak, with some lettuce and light mustard, cooked well.Although it is done well, it is still juicy and delicious.

I also like appetizers -mushrooms and salmon are delicious.

I will definitely come here again!
